comprehensive_overview: PVACTools is a software suite designed for the prediction and analysis of peptide-MHC-I binding affinity and neoantigen assessment for cancer immunotherapy.
core_features: PVACTools provides tools for predicting neoantigens, calculating binding affinity of peptides to MHC-I molecules, and assessing the immunogenicity of potential tumor-specific mutations. It includes modules for epitope prediction, T cell receptor recognition, and neoantigen prioritization.
